name: Computer Workstation
description: Full-size desktop computer with processing suite. Computer/5. Includes monitor, keyboard, mouse, storage.

name: Computer Portacomp
description: Portable laptop-style computer. Computer/3. Battery powered (8 hours). Connects to Link phone for display.

name: Computer Palmtop
description: Small handheld computer. Computer/1. Mostly for storage and simple calculations. Often replaced by Link phone.

name: Software Program - Broker
description: Specialized program for financial/trading analysis. Applied when running trade routes. +1 modifier to Broker checks.

name: Software Program - Navigation
description: Jump drive calculation and route planning. Essential for spacefaring. Applied to all Navigation checks. +1 modifier.

name: Software Program - Library
description: Comprehensive reference library on designated subject. Integrated reference material for specialist checks. Grants DM+2 to Knowledge checks by field.

name: Software Program - Security
description: Offensive and defensive computer security. +1 modifier to all hacking and computer combat checks.

name: Software Program - Targeting
description: Weapon targeting algorithms. Integrated into ship systems. +1 modifier to Gunnery checks when system is online.

name: Software Program - Translator
description: Language translation AI. Allows real-time translation between known languages. +3 modifier to Language checks.

name: Software Program - Analysis
description: Scientific data analysis. Used for research and field analysis. +1 modifier to Science checks.

name: Fuel Cell, Portable
description: Rechargeable fuel cell. Powers portable equipment. Each cell provides 50 hours of operation for typical power draw.

name: Fuel Cell, Vehicle
description: Large fuel cell for vehicles. Powers vehicle systems. Each cell provides 200 hours of operation.

name: Solar Panel Array
description: High-efficiency solar cells. 1 square meter array generates 500W in full daylight. Usable on planets/moons with solar potential.

name: Power Recharging Station
description: Industrial recharging equipment. Recharges fuel cells and batteries. Typically shipboard or groundside installation.

name: 3D Fabricator - Basic
description: Produces plastic/ceramic items from digital templates. TL6-8 technology maximum. Roughly TL9 item per hour.

name: 3D Fabricator - Advanced
description: Sophisticated fabricator. Produces TL10-11 items. Can manufacture metals and complex electronics.

name: Cargo Handler (10-ton)
description: Remote-operated cargo handling system. Lifts 10 tons. Commonly found on small cargo ships.

name: Cargo Handler (100-ton)
description: Heavy-duty cargo handler. Lifts 100 tons. Used on large cargo ships and starports.

name: Mining Explosives (10kg)
description: Controlled mining charges. Sufficient for excavation work. Dealer rating 4+.

name: Shaped Mining Charge (5kg)
description: Directional mining explosion. More efficient than standard charges. DM+1 to excavation rolls.

name: Pentapod Biocontact Lenses
description: Genetically-engineered bacteria used to treat alien (esp. Pentapod) eye conditions. Installed by autodoc.

name: Pentapod Biosampler
description: Biological sampling device designed for Pentapod biology. Analyzes Pentapod tissues and organisms. Grants DM+2 to Science checks on Pentapod biology.

name: Pentapod Water Breather
description: Genetic modification allowing Pentapod-derived humans to breathe in water. Installed via surgery.

name: Microdrone Swarm
description: Swarm of tiny flying robotic drones (0.1kg each, 10 drones per unit). TL11 sensors. Grants DM+2 to Recon via drone observation.

name: Recon Drone
description: Armed drone for reconnaissance. Missiles or autocannon. Piloted or autonomous. Needs Link connection.

name: Attack Drone
description: Armed combat drone. Twin laser cannons. Piloted via network connection or autonomous AI. TL12.

name: Security Robot
description: Armed humanoid security platform. Twin laser pistols, armor plating. Can be programmed with security protocols.

name: Maintenance Robot Shell
description: Heavy maintenance exoskeleton (pilot-operated). Carries industrial tools. Robot-repair or construction focused.

name: Android Doll (Entertainment/Companion)
description: Humanoid android for domestic service or entertainment. Personality matrix customizable. Non-combat oriented.

name: Exploration Probe
description: Small autonomous rover. TL11 sensors and sampling suite. 48-hour range on battery.
